negotiator.config

Interface MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutomatedTournamentConfiguration, MultilateralTournamentConfiguration

    public interface MultilateralTournamentConfigurationInterface
    Stores the configuration variables for the from MultilateralUI

    This object must be serializable and therefore should not contain complex objects but rather RepItems. This object should be immutable.

    Author:
    David Festen, W.Pasman removed many redundant functions

    • Method Detail

      • getDeadline

        Deadline getDeadline()
        Returns:
        Deadline for all sessions.

      • getNumTournaments

        int getNumTournaments()
        Gets the number of negotiation sessions to run
        Returns:
        the number of sessions

      • getPartyItems

        java.util.List<PartyRepItem> getPartyItems()
        Gets read-only list of party repository items. This may include mediator(s)
        Returns:
        a list of all chosen parties. Only a sub-set of the non-mediators will be used in each session, see also getNumNonMediatorsPerSession()

      • getNumSessions

        int getNumSessions()
        Gets the number of negotiation sessions to run
        Returns:
        the number of sessions

      • getProtocolItem

        MultiPartyProtocolRepItem getProtocolItem()
        Gets the protocol to run
        Returns:
        the protocol to run

      • getPartyProfileItems

        java.util.List<ProfileRepItem> getPartyProfileItems()
        Gets read-only list of profiles used by the parties. These protocols are used to generate the sessions. The number of available items determines the maximum number of parties in one session.
        Returns:
        list of profiles used by the parties

      • getNumNonMediatorsPerSession

        int getNumNonMediatorsPerSession()
        Returns:
        the number of non-mediators per session. This can be smaller than size of getPartyItems() because only a subset of the party items will be used in each session.

      • getRepetitionAllowed

        boolean getRepetitionAllowed()
        Gets whether repetition is allowed when generating combinations of agents.
        Returns:
        true if allowed

      • getNumPartiesPerSession

        int getNumPartiesPerSession()
        Returns:
        the number of parties that will be in each session (including mediators).
